item.description:
Hi Everyone,
Im sorry my Experiment with controlling the weather didnt work that well last week..
This week im trying a bit more Plutonimum with Cs buffering in the Electron Beam Collision Reactor..
Hey it worked for Captain Kirk..and he always got the Alien when it worked....
I dont need the alien though, just good weather...

Maybe it will be sunny and hot...but maybe only cloudy and warm..close enough..
Im listing this location again because its a good start place for a lot of you..


IM BRINGING THE, FIRE PIT AND GRILL.... maybe the music man


CHECK BACK SATURDAY MORNING..mostly to see if its bad weather again like last week..
yeh cool and rainy cancells it again..

65*F +10*/- 3.125*, (close enough) and partly cloudy..ok i will go as planned....


OH WEAR FLEECE AND A HAT EVEN IF ITS GOOD OUTSIDE..IT ACTUALLY MAKES THESE EARLY IN THE SEASON PADDLE TRIPS MORE COMFORTABLE....




When
Saturday, May 10, 2008 at 1:00 PM

Im leaving no later than 12:30 from Wethersfield, so if you are stopping by do so earlier...
I cant go fast with all the things loaded..

Where
Eagleville Dam
38 Pine Lake Drive -->Parking area up on dam side
Coventry , CT 06238

Who should come
Beginner and Experienced Kayakers and those that want to get out and enjoy the day.. Any type of kayak ok for here...recreational or sea..

Why
Its a beginning of the season paddling place with a PICKaNICK POT LUCK MEAL AFTER. It was good right up on the dam area where we had it last year.... Bring a blanket too..

How to find the organizer(s)
"I will have my Blue Toyota Avalon with Kayak trailer and the Customary Orange Cones In view"
--AL-r (The Kayaking Honcho)

Details

Hi Everyone..

OK IM LISTING THIS EARLY... I DONT KNOW IF ITS WARM/LOW WIND OUT OR EVEN IF ITS RAINING OUT THIS FAR IN ADVANCE...

i CHOSE SATURDAY AS A START Day again for a bigger group paddle day


dont wear Cotton and Jeans???--if you get wet you will feel really cold..and sorry.....but we wont be far from civilization so you can if you want to...

I will update a few days ahead of the event... sorry best i can do ..LOL

dATA:

This is a location that has a few interesting ponds and river areas that are perfect for recreational kayaks.

The pond portion has interesting big and little birds, the river portion is pretty interesting too...
A little bit of everything in a area that would be much larger elsewhere.

I have a limited amount of kayaks.....but will make doo with what there is...
its also possible to do 2 trips in this are for those that didnt have a yak the first time..

Something like what we did last year worked out pretty good


Oh bring some food..its a POTLUCK outing.....LOL...chairs..and whtever else you like to sit around on after..
..Just Like last year, everything worked out well here, ......i also bring the grill and fire pit...so it should be enough for our smaller group..

PADDLE FASTER.....LOL


Getting there:
From Hartford: take I 84 east to exit 59 onto I - 384 east.... When I 384 ends at rte 6 and 44..take the left split = rte 44 east.... for 7.8 miles and turn right onto rte 32 (Stafford Rd) (This is right after Mansfield Depot) go apx 1.8 miles then take a right on to rte 275 (South Eagleville Road) at the boat launch sign...
The access is on the right in apx .3 miles just after the dam/bridge on the right at the beginning of Pine Lake Drive...

For Mapquest, GPS, or others..use 38 Pine Lake Drive, Coventry, CT to get you close enough.

It only takes a few hours to see a lot here...

See you soon..
AL_R

Oh the kayak donation is because i have to load and drag them things all over the place, fix em, and all the other stuff...and besides a lot of the donation money provides some wine and food for everyone..
...

Oh i cant rent to Maybees...confirmed only's...its not fair to anyone .


Kayaks available:
The Bathtub= Pungo 12'= ?
The Flipper= Riot Tourlite 15'= AL-r
The Bananna= Cobra Expidition 18'= ?
The Eddyliner= Eddyline Wind Dancer 18'= Janice
The Greenland= NDK Greenlander Pro 18'= ALEX
The Hotub= Canoe 18' this one can hold 3 people pretty easily..maybe more..= ?,?, ?
The Doughnut/Toast= car inner tube../ Inflateable Queen Mattress...LOL

item.name: Retry: Kayak Event, Eagleville Pond/Dam and River..up from the dam portion
